config.title: Workspace Sidebar
config.workspaceActions.cur-window: Open in the current window, icon clicks will open in a new window.
config.workspaceActions.description: What action should be taken when clicking on a workspace in the sidebar?
config.workspaceActions.new-window: Open in a new window, icon clicks will open in the current window.
config.workspaceCleanLabels.description: Cleanup workspace file names by turning underscores/hyphens into spaces and formatting to Title Case. Uncheck to leave workspace file names as is.
config.workspaceCondenseFileTree.descrip: Condense the file tree to reduce visual noise from folders (See Readme).
config.workspaceFolder.description: The folder to look in for workspace files - leave blank to default to your home folder. '~' will be replaced with your home folder even on windows.
config.workspaceFolderDepth.description: What depth of subfolders should also be looked in. Range: 0-25
config.workspaceSearchMinimum.descriptio: The minimum number of workspace files required for the search box to be displayed. 0 will always show the search box. Range: 0-100
config.workspaceShowFileIcons.descriptio: EXPERIMENTAL FEATURE. Show file icons next to workspaces, matching is mostly automatic, but can be configured. [See the readme for more information](https://github.com/sketchbuch/vsc-workspace-sidebar#readme).
config.workspaceShowFolderHierarchy.desc: Show file tree instead of a flat list.
config.workspaceShowPath.asneeded: Show paths when a workspace has the same label as another
config.workspaceShowPath.description: Display paths to the workspace files in the sidebar. Either: 'Always', 'Never', or 'As needed' (only shows paths for workspaces with the same label).
views.title: Workspaces
viewsContainers.activitybar.title: Workspaces

fetch.title: An error occured whilst collecting workspace files

default.title: Something went wrong whilst collecting workspaces

notDirectory.title: Folder path is not a directory

noWorkspaces.hintDepth: The current search depth is 0, this means that only the root workspace folder will be searched in for workspace files.
noWorkspaces.hintSettings: Try increasing the search depth or change the folder path.
noWorkspaces.title: Folder contains no workspaces

openFilemanager.ariaLabel: Open folder containing '{{label}}' in your file manager

search.noMatch: No workspaces matched your search terms
